faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about PRDKit

question-1.question: How do I get started with PRDKit?
question-1.answer: Simply sign up for a free account and start chatting with the AI. You can begin creating PRDs immediately without any setup or configuration.

question-2.question: Is my product data secure?
question-2.answer: Yes. We never use your data to train public AI models. Your product information is encrypted and stored securely, and you maintain full ownership of all your content.

question-3.question: Can my whole team use PRDKit?
question-3.answer: Absolutely. PRDKit is built for teams. You can invite unlimited team members, share PRDs, and collaborate in real-time across your organization.

question-4.question: Does PRDKit integrate with our existing tools?
question-4.answer: Yes. Export your PRDs to Notion, Confluence, or any documentation platform. We also integrate with Slack and support AI development tools like Cursor, Bolt, and v0.

question-5.question: Can I customize the PRD format?
question-5.answer: PRDKit adapts to your needs. The AI learns from your context, existing documentation, and preferences to generate PRDs that match your team's style and requirements.
